data.message: I have an entire photo album disappear from my account, how can that happen??? I am very upset!

replies.message: Thanks for reaching out, Nancy. Sometimes when we do maintenance on the site, some photos or albums may temporarily disappear. If you're missing photos, please wait a few hours to see if they reappear. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2hchlUk. -Jessica

Seriously???? So when I click on a photo that is in that album that is missing it just says Nancy Ness Radecker's Photos and does not indicate the album it is in....what does that mean? Is the album gone, please advise
Hello it did not come back and it has been 4 days!! Can someone please answer my private FB message or answer it here PLEASE!!!!
That's awful , I sorry to hear that ! Hope u find it !  😑
Still waiting to hear from FACEBOOK!!!!!
Nancy Ness Radecker did fb ever contacted you to help you with your missing album.? Thanking you in advance.
Jules Nooooo and I am very mad about it!! I answered there open ticket reply and they have yet to reply nor did the akbum come back! Terrible customer service!!!
Wow....I was hoping someone from fb could see this but I guess you right very bad customer service...sorry you lost your album and no one from fb is considering to help you...so sad.
